title: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, July 29, 2013
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, July 29, 2013
teaser: Have you heard of Omnicon and Publicis? They've heard of you, and they're merging. Markets in Japan are down on what's being called a 'mini-correction.' A realtor's tale of the housing boom and bust. And a new survey finds four out of five Americans will struggle with joblessness, near-poverty, or reliance on government welfare at some point in their lives.
byline: Gigi Douban, Kate Davidson, David Weinberg, Sarah McCammon, Sam Beard, Bruce Johnson, Will Oremus, Melissa Hogenboom, David Brancaccio and Mitchell Hartman
description: Have you heard of Omnicon and Publicis? They've heard of you, and they're merging. Markets in Japan are down on what's being called a 'mini-correction.' A realtor's tale of the housing boom and bust. And a new survey finds four out of five Americans will struggle with joblessness, near-poverty, or reliance on government welfare at some point in their lives.
